name: BST (Blood Sweat And Tears)
description:
This is a game where you shoot zombies in a never ending cycle of waves which spawn 1 to 2 zombies. You can purchase and unlock diffrent guns with the money you make from killing the zombies and even upgrade how much money you get per kill.

This is a game made for the 2021 Scratch Game Jam 2 and took around 3 days to make. I have documented the development of the game on my youtube channel:

My YT vid (part 1)

Part 2 coming soon!
